Reviews.Content: We've been back We aren't used to staying in one star hotels, but this hotel treats its guests much better than most three star hotels that we've been in. It is extremely clean, and the couple who manage the hotel are delightful. Violetta speaks several languages. and we didn't have any trouble communicating with her in English.The hotel is a 20 minute bus ride from the train station, but that has a real advantage if you have a car!We were first there for 4 days in September and returned for 5 days in October--we won't even think about staying at any other hotel in Firenze. It was the bargain of our two month vacation in Italy.
Reviews.Author: Jody65

Reviews.Content: Amazing little hotel, cozy, and clean We (my Mom and I) stayed at this hotel for 3 nights and it was so clean and felt like a home away from home. The staff was so nice and helpful. The rooms were very large and (although there were only 6 rooms and 3 bathrooms) everything was clean and well kept. We felt positively a welcoming environment, and there were TV's, sinks and bidets in every room. It was very safe and after finding it (the only difficulty- please follow directions exactly), we had a great time and would definitely stay there again. It was like a little jewel of a hotel. : )
Reviews.Author: pack_y0ur_bags
